about_the_game:
What is wrong with this Garden?!


Punch the Garden is a 2d pixel-art side scrolling beat em up game where you play as a young moustache entering a garden. Your mission is to uncover the source of the park's disorder and understand the reasons behind the chaos.

On your epic journey through the park you'll encounter many odd allies, such as a talking toad, a homeless snail and many more that require your help!

COMBAT

Battle and gain experience to become stronger. This game includes a leveling system, an in depth skills system (over 50+ skills) that offer many different builds / synergize and a companion system! There are many ways to get stronger in the garden!

STAGES

Lots of challenging stages that push you to the limit. Clearing them while meeting certain conditions (time challenge, combo challenge etc) to gain stars that in turn make you even stronger! Bosses that even change the terrain of the map! Fight to your heart's content!


Fight, Level up, Grow, Repeat!! There is nothing better to do than to Punch the Garden!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains acts of violence. It's a fighting game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or higher | AMD R7 360 or higher

short_description: Punch the Garden is a pixel-art action roguelike where you play as a young moustache that is entering a park. But beware the deadly inhabitants. Collect passive skills, level up and get strong enough to conquer the park!
